snippet: The soprano Natalie Dessay, who is halfway through a recital tour with the pianist Philippe Cassard, performed Wednesday evening at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by soprano Natalie Dessay, with pianist Philippe Cassard, at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The soprano Natalie Dessay, who is halfway through a recital tour with the pianist Philippe Cassard, performed Wednesday evening at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Natalie Dessay Performs Chansons and Lieder at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: Embracing the Recital, With Arms Wide Open
headline.print_headline: Embracing the Recital, With Arms Wide Open
